goals.title: Increase Data Collection
goals.description: Add comprehensive metrics to all resonance events
goals.outcome: Implemented auto-metrics collection with decorator pattern. Achieved 100% metrics coverage (7 types: CPU, Memory, Disk I/O, Network, GPU, Task Count, Duration). All future events will have metrics automatically.
